metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7214 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in exception_wrapper.py in OpenStack Nova 13.x through 13.1.3, 14.x through 14.0.4, and 15.x through 15.0.1. Legacy notification exception contexts appearing in ERROR level logs may include sensitive information such as account passwords and authorization tokens.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-api - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-api-metadata - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-api-os-compute - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-api-os-volume - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-cells - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-cert - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-common - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute-kvm - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute-libvirt - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute-lxc - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute-qemu - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute-vmware - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-compute-xen - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-conductor - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-console - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-consoleauth - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-network - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-novncproxy - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-scheduler - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-serialproxy - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-spiceproxy - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-volume - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
nova-xvpvncproxy - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
python-nova - 2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue was introduced in Mitaka

criterions.comment: nova package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:13.1.4-0ubuntu2').
